scripts.update-dependencies: npm install @angular/animations@latest @angular/common@latest @angular/compiler@latest @angular/core@latest @angular/forms@latest @angular/platform-browser@latest @angular/platform-browser-dynamic@latest @angular/router@latest @ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap@latest @popperjs/core@latest bootstrap@latest moment-mini@latest rxjs@latest tslib@latest zone.js@latest
scripts.update-dev-dependencies: npm install @angular-devkit/build-angular@latest @angular-eslint/builder@latest @angular-eslint/eslint-plugin@latest @angular-eslint/eslint-plugin-template@latest @angular-eslint/schematics@latest @angular-eslint/template-parser@latest @angular/cli@latest @angular/compiler-cli@latest @angular/localize@latest @compodoc/compodoc@latest @types/jasmine@latest @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin@latest @typescript-eslint/parser@latest eslint@latest jasmine-core@latest karma@latest karma-chrome-launcher@latest karma-coverage@latest karma-jasmine@latest karma-jasmine-html-reporter@latest ng-packagr@latest prettier@latest prettier-plugin-organize-attributes@latest --save-dev
scripts.publish-lib: ng build ng-bootstrap-date-range-picker && cd ./dist/ng-bootstrap-date-range-picker && npm publish --access=public
